Description

RoadToads is multiplayer frogger with pushing. A fast-paced social game, built into a zero barrier to entry browser experience.

History

After the success of First Annual Road Toads World Championship in 2019 with the crowning of the World Champion we knew we had a special prototype. We started developing RoadToads.io, a free version for the browser as the covid pandemic set in and offline play left impossible. We are now coming up to a public release date scheduled summer 2022.

Features

  • Play from browser with zero barrier to entry
  • Up to 8 concurrent players
  • Fast paced action with easy to pickup, hard to master mechanics
